text: Ironheart is an upcoming American TV miniseries that will be part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Based on the Marvel Comics character Ironheart, the series will release on Disney+. The series is produced by Marvel Studios and stars Dominique Thorne as Ironheart, returning from the MCU movie Black Panther: Wakanda Forever (2022). The series will have 6 episodes. == Cast and characters == * Dominique Thorne as Riri Williams / Ironheart * Anthony Ramos as Parker Robbins / The Hood * Alden Ehrenreich as Joe McGillicuddy * Lyric Ross as Natalie Washington * Matthew Elam as Xavier Washington * Anji White as Ronnie Williams * Manny Montana as Cousin John * Shea Coule√© as Slug == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Upcoming television series Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:American television spin-offs Category:Disney+ original television series Category:Superhero television shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Ironheart (miniseries)
